00029   class FileHandleCallback : public HandleCallback {
00030   public:
00031     FileHandleCallback(uint32_t eventMask) : HandleCallback(eventMask) { return; }
00032     virtual void attr_set(std::string name) { cout << "ATTR SET " << name << endl << flush; }
00033     virtual void attr_del(std::string name) { cout <<  "ATTR DEL " << name << endl << flush; }
00034     virtual void child_node_added(std::string name) { cout << "CHILD NODE ADDED " << name << endl << flush; }
00035     virtual void child_node_removed(std::string name) { cout << "CHILD NODE REMOVED " << name << endl << flush; }
00036     virtual void lock_acquired(uint32_t mode) { 
00037       if (mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED)
00038         cout << "LOCK ACQUIRED shared" << endl << flush;
00039       else if (mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE)
00040         cout << "LOCK ACQUIRED exclusive" << endl << flush;
00041       else
00042         cout << "LOCK ACQUIRED " << mode << endl << flush;
00043     }
00044     virtual void lock_released() { cout << "LOCK RELEASED" << endl << flush; }
00045   };
